description: This file provides a utility class ColorUtils for parsing color values from various input types, such as int, String, or null, and converting them into Color objects. It includes a static method 'parse' which handles different input formats and fallback values.

classes.name: ColorUtils
classes.description: A utility class for working with colors, providing static helper methods for parsing color representations into Color objects.

methods.name: parse
methods.description: Parses a dynamic input into a Color object. Supports input types such as int, String, or null, with optional fallback Color.
